text: urgery.        If cancer is in the subglottis, treatment may include the following:         - Radiation therapy with or without surgery.    - Surgery alone.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage I laryngeal cancer. For more specific results, refine the search by using other search features, such as the location of the trial, the type of treatment, or the name of the drug.
